title: Dysphasic school children
creator_credit: Louise Janas and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: Dysphasic children are those who have trouble expressing and understanding language, and are thus unable to take advantage of much classroom teaching. This program outlines the different teaching methods required to help with their speech difficulties.
creator_credit_for_label: Louise Janas and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
